definitions.definition: Pertaining to apostles or their practice or teaching ; pertaining to the apostles (of early Christianity) or their teachings.
According to the doctrines of the apostles; delivered or taught by the apostles.
Of or pertaining to the pope or the papacy ; papal .
Of or pertaining to the Catholic missions .

main_definition: ( Christianity ) Pertaining to apostles or their practice or teaching ; pertaining to the apostles (of early Christianity) or their teachings.
secondary_definitions: According to the doctrines of the apostles; delivered or taught by the apostles.
Of or pertaining to the pope or the papacy ; papal .
Of or pertaining to the Catholic missions .
